TopicTitle: A small survey: is HTML a programming language?

Articles.Content:
Just to see what the forums think. Nothing more.

Happy Xplosions!

HTML: The HyperText Markup Language or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

by its own name it is not a programming language. Thank you for coming to my ted talk.

223811252022

It can be a deterministic finite automation if you consider pages to be states and clicking links to be their transitions. 
I guess it just boils down to whether you think a programming language has to be Turing complete, or not (like considering SQL a programming language)

Edited November 26, 2022 by Xelo
